patterns: How can I see my average daily spending?
How do I check my average spending?
responses: To view your average spending, go to the Reports section and select the 'Income/Expenses vs. Time' graph. The displayed statistics will include your average daily spending along with other insights.
Navigate to the Reports section, choose the appropriate graph type and time period, and you’ll see your average spending calculated as part of the overall financial statistics.

patterns: How do I generate a financial report?
How do I generate a report?
responses: To generate a report, head to the Reports section. Select a graph type—such as 'Account Balance vs. Time' or 'Income vs. Expenses'—and choose a time period (week, month, year, or all). Click 'Generate Report' to view visual insights and detailed statistics on your financial trends.

Generate your report by navigating to the Reports section, picking your preferred graph type and period, and clicking the 'Generate Report' button. This will provide you with graphs and statistics that reveal your financial patterns.

patterns: How do I create an account?
responses: To create an account, click 'Create Account' on the home page and fill out the registration form. Log in by clicking 'Log In' and entering your credentials. To log out, simply click the 'Log Out' button in the navigation bar.

Account management is simple: create an account from the home page, log in with your credentials, and use the 'Log Out' button when you're finished. All account-related actions can be performed from the dashboard.
